synopsis.text: Rin Rindou once dreamed of becoming a ballet dancer, but an injury forced her to abandon that aspiration. She retreated from the world, becoming a NEET who lived with her grandmother and passed time by gaming. Her quiet life changed suddenly when Rindou was unexpectedly drawn into the futuristic, high-speed racing circuit called NEX. NEX Race is a next-generation motorsport event made possible by advanced technologies like AI support systems and a 500 km/h propulsion mechanism called Revolburst. The dangerous, cutting-edge races are reshaping racing worldwide. Despite no experience, Rindou makes her debut on the NEX scene. Her unconventional background proves an asset as she pioneers creative techniques that further revolutionize the fledgling sport. Rindou contends against the undisputed king of NEX racing, Lorenzo M. Salvatore, who has dominated every season since the event's inception. Salvatore faces an unexpected challenge from this newcomer whose unique skillset and fearless driving threatens to dethrone the reigning champion. Their intense rivalry captivates the racing world.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
